mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE_REPLY SET DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM TB_NOTICE_REPLY WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND REORDER = 0 AND DELFLAG = 'N'

SELECT CASE WHEN @prev_value = A.REPLY_NO THEN @vRank WHEN @prev_value := A.REPLY_NO THEN @vRank := @vRank + 1 END AS rank ,A.REPLY_NO AS P_REPLY_NO , A.SEQ AS P_SEQ , A.REPLY_TEXT AS P_REPLY_TEXT , A.REPLY_WRITER AS P_REPLY_WRITER , A.REG_DATE AS P_REG_DATE , A.UPDATE_DATE AS P_UPDATE_DATE , A.DELFLAG AS P_DELFLAG
, B.REPLY_NO AS C_REPLY_NO , B.SEQ AS C_SEQ , B.REPLY_TEXT AS C_REPLY_TEXT , B.REPLY_WRITER AS C_REPLY_WRITER , B.REG_DATE AS C_REG_DATE , B.UPDATE_DATE AS C_UPDATE_DATE , B.REORDER , B.DELFLAG AS C_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT @vRank := 0, @prev_value := NULL) AS r, ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 NO, A.* FROM TB_NOTICE_REPLY A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) R WHERE A.SEQ = #{seq} AND A.REPARENT = 0 AND A.DELFLAG = 'N' ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC ) A LEFT JOIN TB_NOTICE_REPLY B ON B.SEQ = A.SEQ AND B.REPARENT = A.REPLY_NO HAVING rank > #{criteria.pageStart} AND rank <= (#{criteria.pageStart} +10) ORDER BY A.REPLY_NO DESC,B.REORDER;
